# Craft

Craft is a small & efficient PHP5.4+ framework that helps you to quickly build webapps.
It only provides mere tools and libs, the rest is up to your creativity !

### Packages

- Craft\App
- Craft\Box
- Craft\Cli
- Craft\Data
- Craft\Error
- Craft\Event
- Craft\Log
- Craft\Routing
- Craft\Orm
- Craft\Pattern
- Craft\Kit
- Craft\Remote
- Craft\Storage
- Craft\Data\Text
- Craft\View
- Craft\Web
